prompt: A vibrant underwater scene featuring an uncommon Glowing Lionfish. The Lionfish has long, flowing fins that pulse with bioluminescent light, casting a soft glow over the vivid coral formations and other exotic sea creatures around it. The background is an ethereal mix of blues and greens, with bubbles rising and the dappled sunlight filtering through the water surface. The art style is bright and detailed, capturing the delicate beauty and mystical quality of the underwater world.
